document.full_text: south african president jacob zuma arrived in tripoli on monday for talks with libyan leader muammar gaddafi, a meeting some hope could help find a solution to the violence in the country.
document.title: south african president zuma arrives in tripoli
lines_and_colors: south african president jacob zuma arrived in tripoli on monday for talks with libyan leader muammar gaddafi, a meeting some hope could help find a solution to the violence in the country.
